metadata.title: Friday, 6th October, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct houses for teachers in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, how many houses will be constructed in 2023;
(c) when the project will commence; and
(d) what the estimated cost for the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government issued mining licenses to any companies at Nkombwa Hill Mine in Isoka Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, what the names of the companies that were issued with mining licenses are; and
(c) if not, what measures are being taken to prevent illegal mining activities in the area.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that some police officers have been sexually abusing detainees in police custody;
(b) if so, what measures the Government is taking to curb the vice and reassure the public; and
(c) whether a Commission of Inquiry will be set up to establish the depth of the problem.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Mansa -Kashikishi road;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(c) when the rehabilitation of the Tuta road between Chitambo and Samfya Districts will be completed. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th September) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Emmanuel Tembo, MP) ___________________________
